Response¶

Response Json¶

def hello_world():
    return {'msg': 'Hello, World!'}

Response XML¶

from lawliet import Response
xml_str = '<xml>..</xml>'
def hello_world():
    return Response(xml_str, headers={'Content-type': 'application/xml'})

Response HTML¶

from lawliet import Response
def hello_world():
    return Response('Hello, World!', headers={'Content-type': 'application/html'})
